solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String reverseString(String s) {--newline--        int length = s.length();--newline--        if (length <= 1) return s;--newline--        String leftStr = s.substring(0, length / 2);--newline--        String rightStr = s.substring(length / 2, length);--newline--        return reverseString(rightStr) + reverseString(leftStr);--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
